entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 10:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: ESE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow or ice pellets beginning early in the afternoon then changing to freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Low plus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle in the evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low plus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
